title: Prototipo
description: Compilation. Lyric and satiric poetry.Here is the prototype of contemporary Italian literature.Emiliano Balistreri, after representing the feelings and evoking emotions in “Plastica evoluzione”, after having explored the meaning of words and the essence, the presence and absence of the psyche in “PsicoCromo”, with Prototype amazes and stuns with dreams of love, introspective analysis and ironic interpretations of customs of today turning everything into a literary video clip and noting sarcastically emptiness of being a writer.Emiliano Balistreri confirms its own specific expressive figure shaping the language in order to adapt to the reality of the new millennium, changes the use of free verse, stands out in style offering the reader a different approach to writing.Free download avaible at Emiliano Balistreri's profile on Academia.edu web site.PrototipoRecensito ne La Nuova Venezia, 17 dicembre 2003. Non ha partecipato a concorsi e premi letterari.Autoprodotto, 2003, non distribuito sul mercato. Esaurito. Versione gratuita in pdf in lingua italiana ed inglese scaricabile da Academia.edu.
author: Emiliano Balistreri
